data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using a maximum of five sentences. The story must include the following three words: petrol, diesel, pump. However, the story should not be about going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle.
data.output: In her eccentric laboratory hidden beneath Paris's winding streets artist Colette concocted vibrant perfumes from unusual sources - she'd distill essence extracted by simmering rare flowers over low-burning flames fueled alternately between vials filled either richly scented 'petrol' blooms gathered under moonlight near abandoned refineries along Normandy coastlines; while contrasting darker aromatic notes came courtesy robust stalks found thriving deep within former industrial sites where decades prior massive machines once roared burning copious amounts heavy black viscous liquid known colloquially simply yet ominously enough merely just plain old raw unfiltered smoky oil also called more specifically when refined properly pure high-grade premium grade quality lubricating agent now popularized amongst enthusiasts world-wide loving classic engine purists everywhere still widely referring affectionally even today back fond memories time-honored name – “diesel”. Her masterpiece awaited one final touch before being unveiled at prestigious Biennale exhibition soon approaching fast upon horizon nearing culmination point this latest work titled provocatively indeed rather tellingly so apt too most definitely thought-provoking like all else preceding output displayed across career spanning many years thus far since first beginning artistic journey long ago starting humbely out small modest studio tucked away somewhere quiet corner city life elsewhere other side river Seine itself

data.output: In ancient times when gods still walked among mortals there was one who controlled life itself - Elyria Goddess Of Life's Organ Music which could heal any wound but at great cost; she would only play her ethereal melodies if those seeking healing were willing surrender their darkest memories forever lost within mystical realm known 'The Echo'. data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.system_prompt: You are an expert creative story writer. You will be given three words (e.g., car, wheel, drive) and then asked to write a creative short story that contains these three words. The idea is that instead of writing a standard story such as "I went for a drive in my car with my hands on the steering wheel.", you come up with a novel and unique story that uses the required words in unconventional ways or settings.
data.user_prompt: Write a creative short story using a maximum of five sentences. The story must include the following three words: gloom, payment, exist. However, the story should not be about the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment.
data.output: In ancient times when gods still roamed among mortals under veils shrouded by eternal twilight's mysterious shadows - also known simply 'The Gloom', there existed hidden temples where one could make sacred offerings called payments so their deepest desires would manifest into reality; however only those who possessed hearts pure enough were granted this gift allowing them truly begin anew free from past burdens.
